title: Bug 102623: Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
OB: After importing an image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout, deleting it from the outline image and renaming another image 'image2.jpg' to 'image1.jpg', the original image is still displayed instead of the newly imported image.
EB: Importing the 'image1.jpg' file again into the layout should display the newly imported image, replacing the original one.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:

1. Import an image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout view.
2. Delete the 'image1.jpg' file from the outline image.
3. Rename 'image2.jpg' as 'image1.jpg'.
4. Verify that the original image is still displayed instead of the newly imported image.
